about_the_game:
Set foot into a completely unexplored sandbox world, full of dangers, and wonders to be seen.

Open-ended gameplay to fit different playstyles.

Find the perfect plot of land to build a home, and return to it after exploration.

Experience an in-game time and weather cycle

All adventuring is permanent, the world may be infinite but you cannot go back to what you have previously explored.

Slowly increase your riches, or win the jackpot and be set forever!

This game is still undergoing development, join the Discord to submit positive or negative feedback, or suggest concepts to be added to the game.

name: The Dabloon Project

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: An Exploration/Adventure game set in a procedural map. Fight, Explore, and Build to become comfortable with your Dabloon fortune.
